concept.title: Water Circulation in the Cooling System
concept.shortdesc: The car uses a Thermo-syphon cooling system that circulates water based on temperature differences, with circulation beginning at approximately 180 degrees Fahrenheit.

conbody.p: The cooling apparatus of the car is known as the Thermo-syphon system. It acts on the principle that hot water seeks a higher level than cold water.

section.title: Circulation Process
section.p: When the water reaches approximately 180 degrees Fahrenheit, circulation commences in the following sequence:

ol.li: Water flows from the lower radiator outlet pipe
Moves up through the water jackets
Enters the upper radiator water tank
Flows down through the tubes to the lower tank
